Title: Leaf Boundary [District of Columbia--Washington]
Description: Leaf collection boundary. The fall leaf collection program runs from the first week of November through the second week of January. Loose leaves will be sent for composting. In neighborhoods with alley trash/recycling collections, bagged leaves may be placed where trash and recycling are collected.
Creator: D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer
Place: District of Columbia--Washington, District of Columbia
